profileAlternative.name: Jason Roth
profileAlternative.headline: SQL Developer
profileAlternative.summary: Over 4 years of experience focused on delivering Business Intelligence Analysis tools. Skilled in T - SQL, SSIS,SSRS 2005/2008/2012, Data Warehousing, ETL, data mapping, system installation and configuration, upgrading, query optimization and tuning, Backup/Restore, data import/export, troubleshooting, testing, data load automation, star schema, snow flake schema, Stored procedures, Functions etc. Flexible, enthusiastic and project oriented team player with strong analysis, design, development, testing, and implementation experience. Solid communication and leadership skills to develop creative solutions for challenging client needs.

positions.title: SQL Developer
positions.description:
Collaborate with clinical users and informaticist to gather business requirements for new data development tasks. Analyze clinical work flow and application to identify related information extraction method in SQL data warehouse.
Hands-on development in complex data extraction utilizing SQL technologies such as stored procedures, SSIS and .NET. Engineer efficient, automated and reliable solutions to deliver accurate data results.
Analyze clinical and business needs and requirements to define and build datamart with historical and multidimensional structure in assisting management decision-making for financial planning and clinical efficiency.
Analyze clinical data structure between different systems to integrate data into a central data warehouse.
Develop complex dashboard reports and scheduled delivery processes utilizing SSRS, SSIS and SQL jobs.
Efficiently produce ad-hoc SQL based reports in an on-demand environment.
Improve, reengineer and optimize legacy reports utilizing available technologies. Architect and design new database structure and schema. Maintain healthy SQL server, performance tuning and resolve data specific issues.
Maintain existing and develop new ETL processes to facilitate healthcare data exchange between SQL data repository, datamart and other data sources.
…
see more

positions.title: SQL Developer
positions.description:
Analyze business requirements and functional specifications and translated them to technical solutions.
Drive design process and develop solutions according to design specifications.
Design SSIS packages to load dimensional and fact data in to data warehouse.
Test existing SSIS packages for data load and resolve any functional or performance issues.
Perform upgrades on existing SSIS packages from SQL 2005/2008 to 2012
Import production data from various sources including Access, Excel, and perform data validations, data cleaning, apply logics to meet business requirements.
Designed SSIS packages for new data warehouse loads utilizing SQL 2005 / 2008 / 2012 databases and MS BI development studio (Visual Studio 2010 / 2012).
Designed and implemented data models with Erwin.
Created SSRS reports based on business intelligence specifications.
Performed upgrades on existing SSIS from SQL 2005 / 2008 and DTS 2000 to SQL 2012.
Deployed SSIS packages to QA and production servers and provided production support.
Created stored procedures and other utilities to manage relational and dimensional data.
Assisted with installation and configuration of SQL instances.
Assisted Senior Database Administrator with performance tuning, back up procedures / schedules.

…
see more

positions.title: Clinical Trial Support Specialist
positions.description:
Monitored, collected and tracked trial information regarding Financial Disclosures, prepared regulatory documents for New Drug Application (NDA) submissions by Drug and Regulatory Affairs upon completion
Developed a solid understanding of the international process for trial related functions, especially Financial Disclosure collection
Created MS Access database used for storage and processing of investigator information; Database also served to give upper level management information regarding status of upcoming submissions and streamlined processes and reduces time needed to accomplish deadlines by creating regulatory documents used for New Drug Application (NDA) submissions to the FDA

positions.description:
Imaged and indexed all Patient Case Report Forms in Clinical Data Management System (CDMS).
Researched and resolved indexing discrepancies
Completed double key data entry from imaged CRF’s into CDMS
Verified and approved entered data
Performed database QA/QC on assigned projects

Jason is a quality IT professional with great experience within the SQL development space. He has been a pleasure to work with and has made my job very easy throughout the course of our relationship. Jason is hard working, strong willed, and an organized IT professional. I am looking forward to working with him both now and in the future and would recommend him for any opportunity.

received.text: Working with Tyler has been and still is a truly pleasurable experience.  Tyler took the time to get to know me and has been on my side throughout the entire process.  He was extremely responsive, and eager in assisting me find an opportunity.  Never once did I question that Tyler was on my team, doing what he could to make the job offer not only happen but also include the salary I was looking for.  I can’t say it enough, if you’re looking for a job or want to make a change Tyler and TEKSystems will work hard to get you what you’re looking for!
